subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: When Mark Emmert took over the N.C.A.A. in 2010, he may have underestimated how difficult it would be to bring about change in the way college athletics are governed.
snippet: When Mark Emmert took over the N.C.A.A. in 2010, he may have underestimated how difficult it would be to bring about change in the way college athletics are governed.
